channel.title: Audit services on Juice's documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Audit services on Juice's documentation

item.title: What's New in Audit 7.0.3
item.description: Quick access Fixed file upload issue Fixed middleware registration Added more AuditFilterOptions methods Handle aborted request Fixed file upload issue In the case when you are using multipart form data to upload files, the file section stream must be processed for upload first. Otherwise, it can cause the error Unexpected end of Stream…. So we have to move the collection of request form data after other middleware is processed to avoid the issue.
